value.name: Former Rio Rancho coach to make comeback in Belen
value.description: He left in 2007 to coach at El Paso Bel Air, his most recent coaching job. Lopez and Belen Superintendent Lawrence Sanchez were college teammates at New Mexico Highlands. Belen on Wednesday interviewed six finalists. The other five men in the hunt were ...
